text: This is a list of prime ministers of Lesotho since the creation of the post of Prime Minister of Lesotho in 1965, to the present day. == List == Prime Minister Portrait Tenure Elected Political affiliation Political affiliation Monarch(s) Prime Minister Portrait Took office Elected Political affiliation Political affiliation Monarch(s) Left office Time in office 1 Sekhonyana Nehemia Maseribane 1965 1965 1965 Basotho National Party Moshoeshoe II 2 Leabua Jonathan 1965 1986 1970 1985 Basotho National Party Moshoeshoe II – Justin Metsing Lekhanya 1986 1991 – Military Moshoeshoe II – Justin Metsing Lekhanya 1986 1991 – Military Letsie III – Elias Phisoana Ramaema 1991 1993 – Military Letsie III 3 Ntsu Mokhehle 1993 1994 1993 Basutoland Congress Party Letsie III – Hae Phoofolo 1994 1994 – Independent Letsie III Ntsu Mokhehle 1994 1998 – Basutoland Congress Party Letsie III Ntsu Mokhehle 1994 1998 – Basutoland Congress Party Moshoeshoe II Ntsu Mokhehle 1994 1998 – Basutoland Congress Party Letsie III Ntsu Mokhehle 1994 1998 – Lesotho Congress for Democracy Letsie III 4 Pakalitha Mosisili 1998 2012 1998 2002 2007 Lesotho Congress for Democracy Letsie III 4 Pakalitha Mosisili 1998 2012 1998 2002 2007 Democratic Congress Letsie III 5 Tom Thabane 2012 2015 2012 All Basotho Convention Letsie III Pakalitha Mosisili 2015 2017 2015 Democratic Congress Letsie III Tom Thabane 2017 2020 2017 All Basotho Convention Letsie III Moeketsi Majoro 2020 2022 All Basotho Convention Letsie III Sam Matekane 2022 2022 Revolution for Prosperity Letsie III ==References== List of presidents of Lesotho Lesotho
title: List of prime ministers of Lesotho
